10000.desc: Purchase to receive Floating Gun, a floating Commander outfit.

10001.desc: Cooperation and trust begins with a friendly handshake.

10002.desc: Nothing screams "victory" like an excited jump.

10003.desc: You've worked hard for these gains. They deserve to be showed to the whole world.

10004.desc: Tickets that glitter like the stars. Can be used to draw prizes in the Stellar Prize Draw. When the current run of the Stellar Prize Draw ends, any Stellar Tickets left over will be automatically used to draw prizes or be converted to Gems.

10005.desc: Fresh wheat straight from the fields. The base ingredient needed to make flour.

10006.desc: Ripe, golden corn. It lends a sweet smell to the fields.

10007.desc: High-quality grass. Provides life in abundance to the farm!

10008.desc: White, high-quality rice. Contains plentiful starch and granular protein.

10009.desc: Crisp and delicious napa cabbage. It's straight from the farm!

10010.desc: Round, fluffy, and filled with protein. Has all sorts of uses, not just in cooking, but in manufacturing as well.

10011.desc: The king of starch in the vegetable world. Can be prepared in all kinds of ways.

10018.desc: A crystal of island development experience. Required to Limit Break characters.

10019.desc: A hardcover book that smells of ink and sports a classic vibe. It's worthy of going on your table and being reread time and time again.

10020.desc: A gorgeous, fresh bouquet. Its flowers are brimming with color and life, and they promise joy for the days to come.

10021.desc: This ceremonial sword with a flowing silhouette gives off the cold brilliance of steel. It silently speaks of order and majesty.

10022.desc: An adorable stuffed animal that's soft to the touch. Give it a hug, and its fluffy warmth and innocent smile will soften your heart.

10023.desc: The sands of time have poured over this ornament, turning it into an elegant antique. Quietly, it lends an air of tranquility to a room.

103000.desc: Feed for the Clucky Clucky Bird. Made by processing wheat.

103001.desc: Feed for the Oinky Oinky Pig. Made by processing corn.

103002.desc: Feed for the Moo Moo Cow. Made by processing grass.

103003.desc: Feed for the Baa Baa Sheep. Made by processing grass.

111101.desc: A juvenile bivalve. It exhibits stable growth, with good cultivation techniques in place.

111102.desc: A juvenile benthic freshwater fish. It's resilient to low-oxygen environments and is suited for high-density cultivation in fish pens with muddy bottoms.

111103.desc: A juvenile omnivorous freshwater fish. It's highly adaptable to its environment, and exhibits stable growth in all kinds of water conditions.

111104.desc: A juvenile freshwater fish. It mainly eats algae and organic matter, contributing to the ecosystem's maintenance.

111105.desc: A juvenile freshwater shrimp. It eats leftover feed and some species of algae, functioning as a natural cleaner.

111106.desc: A juvenile crustacean. Its shell turns red and becomes hard as it grows. Its mature form is traded as a popular marine product.

111107.desc: A juvenile carnivorous fish. Its meat is tender, and it's cultivated as a high-quality edible fish.

111108.desc: A juvenile crab that frequently molts. It needs to be raised in a clean water environment.

111201.desc: A juvenile cephalopod. After undergoing several transformations during its growth process, it develops tender flesh.

111202.desc: A juvenile carnivorous fish. It's often found in the middle water layers and boasts good growth potential.

111203.desc: A juvenile large palegic fish. It grows quickly and demands an aquatic environment with ample oxygen supply.

111204.desc: A juvenile migratory fish. It loves cooler waters and develops a delectable flesh through gentle care.

111205.desc: A juvenile warm saltwater fish. It gains a vibrant body color after finishing its growth, making it a prized ornamental fish.

111206.desc: A juvenile fish that lives in coral reefs. Its robust constitution makes it easy to cultivate.

111207.desc: A juvenile yellowfin tuna. It's a quick swimmer and demands oxygen-rich waters for successful cultivation.

111208.desc: A juvenile benthic echinoderm. It subsists on accumulated organic matter, so it cleans the bottom of the fish pen efficiently.

111500.desc: A lure shaped like an earthworm. Fish are likely to go for it on account of its realistic appearance.

111502.desc: A lure carefully made to look like a shelled shrimp.

111503.desc: A lure with a distinctive shape.
